Provisioning.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CUSTOMER_MANAGED  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
The key of the resource tag.

--- Required: Yes Type: String Minimum Length: 1 Maximum Length: 128 Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
The value of the resource tag.

--- Required: Yes Type: String Maximum Length: 256 Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A description of a resource tag.

--- Required: No Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
A description of the service template.

--- Required: No Type: String Maximum Length: 500 Update requires: No interruption

DisplayName.description: The name of the service template as displayed in the developer interface.
DisplayName.markdownDescription:
The name of the service template as displayed in the developer interface.

--- Required: No Type: String Minimum Length: 1 Maximum Length: 100 Update requires: No interruption

EncryptionKey.description: A customer provided encryption key that's used to encrypt data.
EncryptionKey.markdownDescription:
A customer provided encryption key that's used to encrypt data.

--- Required: No Type: String Minimum Length: 1 Maximum Length: 200 Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov):[a-zA-Z0-9-]+:[a-zA-Z0-9-]*:\d{12}:([\w+=,.@-]+[/:])*[\w+=,.@-]+$ Update requires: Replacement

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^[0-9A-Za-z]+[0-9A-Za-z_\-]*$  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description:
An optional list of metadata items that you can associate with the Proton service template. A tag is a key-value pair.

For more information, see Proton resources and tagging in the Proton User Guide.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An optional list of metadata items that you can associate with the Proton service template. A tag is a key-value pair.

For more information, see Proton resources and tagging in the Proton User Guide.

--- Required: No Type: Array Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service template.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service template.

--- Required: No Type: String Minimum Length: 1 Maximum Length: 200 Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov):[a-zA-Z0-9-]+:[a-zA-Z0-9-]*:\d{12}:([\w+=,.@-]+[/:])*[\w+=,.@-]+$ Update requires: No interruption
